title: Greg Miller Wears a Little Girl's Shirt
description:
Roger Craig Smith came to IGN Up at Noon today. He brought gifts. Greg insisted on wearing them all...

Watch Up at Noon: http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL54DA5E32466C49D8

Watch Greg take the shirt off: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=L39-GJMCUtU&list=PL54DA5E32466C49D8&index=1

Follow Greg on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/gameovergreggy

Follow Roger on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/RogerCraigSmith

transcript_chunks.text: It's going to tear, we're not. It's stuck in like a dozen Wings. Yeah, God. I've been every Monday on IGN Up at Noon. I've been every Monday on IGN Up at Noon. All right, let's go. Give me the mic.
